Index.title: Welcome to the World of Tewodros Birhanu
Index.subtitle: Explore My Journey
Index.description: Embark on a journey through my personal website, where I showcase my experiences and passions. Join me as I share my story with the world.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hey there! I'm Tewodros Birhanu (ቴዲ - Teddy). I'm a full-stack web and React Native developer with type-safety, building elegant and user-friendly applications that perform with energy and finesse. Fueled by coffee (or as we say, Bunna ☕), and equipped with a degree from Haramaya University, I'm constantly learning and exploring the latest in tech.
about.hobbies: When I'm not writing code, you can find me diving into my projects or enjoying some authentic Ethiopian coffee ☕. Let's team up and bring your wildest web and app ideas to life.
